name: sentences_with_friends
description: Walkthrough * User will have an option to create or join a server. * If user creates a server he/she will be provided with an access code which can be given to their friends * If user joins server he will need to use the access code to join the same room as friend. * 2-4 players * User has to create a name and pick a favorite color before joining a room * After joining/creating a room, host of the room has ability to start the game
author: Shoaib Shaikh
